original_text: When Jethro heard what Moses said, he was very happy. He realized that the Lord had saved the Israelites from the power of the Egyptians.
korean_text: 이드로가 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 큰 은혜를 베푸사 애굽 사람의 손에서 구원하심을 기뻐하여

sentences.original_text: When Jethro heard what Moses said
sentences.korean_translation: 이드로가 모세가 말한 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had saved the Israelites
from the power of the Egyptians
